name: Wrapped on E
description:
Wrapped on E is a hardcore game for car control and time measurement experts you would be hardcore gamer for completing the game. This game is supposed to be a multiplayer game to challenge your friends but we need a playerbase first to release the multiplayer update (with no additional cost)

There is a timer in the left bottom corner and you have to complete the track before the timer goes to zero

there are fast speed moving obstacles (they have the color pink) and you should avoid them + the car can stop working if you damage it too much
